snippet.title: Lord of the Dark Castle (Official Trailer) - Now at Steam!
snippet.description: Lord of the Dark Castle is a casual turn-based retro style roguelike dungeon crawler with elements of strategy. Randomized levels, lots of skills without dependencies and lots of spells to cast. Challenging Monster AI - play it smart or die. Death is Permanent!
